Description: Glazed pottery oil lamp; wheel-made; light-brown clay fabric, covered inside with strips of yellow and light-brown glaze, including splashes of the same glaze on the exterior; open saucer form with a flate base, loop handle and pinched wick-hole.
Curator's comments: Cf. W. S. Kubiak, 'Medieval Ceramic Oil Lamps from Fustat', Ars Orientalis 8 (1970) 1-18, esp. 15 (type J).
